resources.string: A new map will be added now. Will you leave a review at the App Store?
Will you leave a review at the App Store?
You have failed to connect to the network.
A new version has been released. Do you want to update?
You can only play after updating to the newest version.
You can only use one GIFTCODE per hour.
This GIFTCODE has already been used.
We are distributing GIFTCODEs at facebook.com/litqoo
You can receive awards after running the game.
Saves you from breaking a combo once
Marks wind velocity as a number
When the ball bounces out, touch the ball.
Your nickname must be less than 8 characters in length.
You can select a maximum of 3 items per game.
